name: Reflection
Lore: 'It was hard to imagine the enormous losses the Alliance suffered during the Battle of Hoth. Leia contemplated what she could do to help the Rebellion recover.',
Text: 'Deploy on Leia. Once during each of your control phases, you may use 3 Force to retrieve one card from your Lost Pile. Also, when an apprentice, adds 1 to her training destiny.',
